dt: {bc}any of an order or suborder (Mantodea and especially family Mantidae) of large usually green insects that feed on other insects and clasp their prey in forelimbs held up as if in prayer

et: New Latin, from Greek, literally, diviner, prophet; akin to Greek {it}mainesthai{/it} to be mad {ma}{mat|mania|}{/ma}
shortdef: any of an order or suborder (Mantodea and especially family Mantidae) of large usually green insects that feed on other insects and clasp their prey in forelimbs held up as if in prayer
